message: Tell me about what you do now.

Oh yeah, so I work on like big web stuff at my company, making sure everything runs smooth and doesn't break when lots of people use it. I also mess around with smart computer programs that learn from data to make the app better for users. It's pretty fun honestly.

We changed how the whole thing was set up so it didn't crash when traffic got crazy, and I helped tweak how we use the cloud so the company saved a bunch of money. People were pretty happy about that part.
